column6:
SERIES FINALE! Ultimatum tie-in!,2009,2
It all began when four teenagers got caught in an experiment gone fantastically wrong. Now, in a series finale you won't believe, Reed, Ben, Sue, and Johnny will discover that nothing lasts forever-especially family.
Rated A ...$3.99
